summary: AN ORDINANCE providing for the improvement of Rainier Ave. S. Thayer St. to 57th Ave. S; by constructing watermains together with fire hydrants and the necessary appurtenances; all in accordance with Resolution No. 22886 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of installment notes.
